text: int main ( ) { long int T , i , N ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < T ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; long int A [ N ] , i ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & A [ i ] ) ; } int sum = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; ) { int count = 1 ; if ( A [ i ] <= A [ i + 1 ] ) { while ( A [ i ] <= A [ i + 1 ] ) { count ++ ; i ++ ; } } else i ++ ; sum = sum + count ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
